#labels Phase-Implementation
<strong>Permission::assign($who, $permission);</strong>

Desc: Assign a permission to a worker role

Param: $who - assign target, could be a worker role type name
             $permission - permission name

return: true or error message


<strong>Permission::check($who, $permission);</strong>

Desc: Check if a worker role has a certain permission

Param: $who - assign target, could be a worker role type name
             $permission - permission name

return: true or false

<strong>Permission::unassign($who, $permission);</strong>

Desc: Unassign a permission for a certain worker role

Param:$who - assign target, could be a worker role type name
             $permission - permission name

return: true or error message

<strong>Permission::add($permission);</strong>

Desc: Add new permission

<strong>Permission::delete($permission);</strong>

Desc: Delete permission
